article: the united arab emirates -lrb- uae -rrb- donated #.# million u.s. dollars to the un relief and works agency for palestinian refugees -lrb- unrwa -rrb- , the agency announced thursday .
abstract: unrwa gets donations from arab states to cover shortfall
